name: simple-erc20

scripts.startBscTestnet: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --all --reset && truffle run verify Migrations Presale PresaleFactory Locker --network bscTestnet
scripts.startBscMainnet: truffle migrate --network bscMainnet --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_selectedContracts% --network bscMainnet
scripts.startRinkeby: truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_selectedContracts% --network rinkeby
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_selectedContracts% --network mainnet
scripts.startInnovate: truffle migrate --network %(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)% --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_selectedContracts% --network $(grep DEPLOY_NETWORK .env)

allContracts: Migrations ERC20Token ERC20TokenFactory Presale PresaleFactory Locker
